articles.author: Kevin Breuninger
articles.title: Trump recommends 50% tariff on European Union starting June 1 - CNBC
articles.description: President Donald Trump believes European Union proposals have not matched those from other trading partners, U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump on Friday said he is "recommending a straight 50% Tariff on the European Union" after complaining that tradenegotiations have stalled.
The steep new import duties would start … [+4063 chars]
